mapper.sql: DNLD_HST_CD /*다운로드이력코드 */ , MENU_CD /*메뉴코드 */ , DNLD_NM /*다운로드명 */ , REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , AMD_DT /*수정일시 */
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CRM_XLS_DNLD_HST A LEFT JOIN CRM_MENU_BAS B ON A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD

SELECT A.DNLD_HST_CD /*다운로드이력코드 */ , A.MENU_CD /*메뉴코드 */ , A.DNLD_NM /*다운로드명 */ , A.REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , A.REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , A.AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , A.AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , B.MENU_NM , ( SELECT LISTAGG(MENU_NM, '>') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY MENU_LVL_NO) FROM CRM_MENU_BAS WHERE 1=1 START WITH MENU_CD = A.MENU_CD CONNECT BY PRIOR PRNTS_MENU_CD = MENU_CD ) MENU_PATH FROM CRM_XLS_DNLD_HST A LEFT JOIN CRM_MENU_BAS B ON A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
